Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: yes, it's "linear" growth. y(x)=x goes to infinity, but much slower than x^2 but faster than log(x). Most don't have a good grasp on O(n) notation stuff and the different types of infinity. KMD supply goes to infinity *crazy slowly*. Slower than almost all polynomials
